data.title: Markdown Support Example
data.subtitle: Authoring content with Markdown
data.content:
**SankhyaBook 365** is‚Äîand will always be‚Äî**free to use**. We believe that world-class knowledge management should be accessible to every organization on Microsoft 365. We sustain our development through optional, high-value professional services for teams that need a tailored touch.

----------

### Choose Your Path

|**Feature**  | **Community Edition (Free)** |**Customization Support (Paid)**
|--|--|--|
|**License Cost**  | **$0 / month** | **Contact us**   |
|**User Limit**|Unlimited|Unlimited|
| **Core Features** |All Hierarchy & Search tools| All Hierarchy & Search tools
|**Updates**|Regular Store Updates| Based on agreement |
| **Deployment** | Self-Service | **Guided Installation & Setup** |
| **Customization** | Standard Web Part Properties | **Custom CSS & Feature Dev** |
| **Support** | Community / Documentation | **Direct Priority Email Support** |

----------

## üõ†Ô∏è Optional Professional Services

_Need something beyond the box? Our engineering team is available for bespoke engagements._

### 1. Expert Deployment & Onboarding

Ensure your knowledge base is architected correctly from day one. We assist with:

-   Tenant-wide deployment and API permission auditing.
    
-   Migration of existing SharePoint Wiki or Page content into SankhyaBook 365 hierarchies.
    
-   Training sessions for Site Owners and Content Managers.
    

### 2. Bespoke Customization

While SankhyaBook 365 is feature-rich, your organization may have specific branding or functional requirements.

-   **Custom UI/UX:** Tailored CSS to match your corporate brand identity perfectly.
    
-   **Feature Requests:** Need a specific integration? We can develop custom extensions for your tenant.
    
-   **Private Builds:** Dedicated versions of the web part for highly regulated environments.
    

### 3. Managed Support SLA

For organizations requiring guaranteed response times and technical peace of mind.

-   Dedicated Support Engineer.
    
-   24-hour initial response time.
    
-   Direct screen-share troubleshooting sessions.
